says: Thanks for checking out Life Start, my name is Aida.
I'm a chatbot here to help with your course-related needs.
Let's start out with what province you are looking to get your training done in.
It looks like we haven't expanded in your area yet, you can sign up for our newsletter and when we open a location in your province we will let you know.
To subscribe to our newsletter, click the 'Subscribe' tab on the left side of the page and enter your information. We will let you know when our services become availanle in your location.
Is there anything else I can help you with today?

reply.question: Yes, take me back to the beginning!

says: At Life Start, we are overacheivers. I'm always looking to improve!
If you would like to complete a short satisfaction survey about your experience with me today, please click here. This survey is completely optional, and is used to help improve my user experience.
Otherwise, have a lovely day! You can click 'start over' to restart the conversation.
What can I assist you with today?

reply.question: I need help choosing the right course
I need help finding the next course dates in my area

says: Could you please select your preferred location?
